message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I really like the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand that $120 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell it to you for $160.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to pay a premium. I'm willing to meet you at $155, which is a great compromise for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $155, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $145, but that's as high as I can go. Can we meet in the middle again?
